id.description: String to identify the task. This string is used by the scene when updating a task’s status. If no id is provided, the server will generate one.

description.description: Label for the task that appears in the quest progress UI and the quest details

coordinates.description: Coordinates of the parcel on the Decentraland map where this task is carried out. When coordinates are present, the task has a “Jump in” button on the quest progress UI. This button teleports players to those coordinates.

required.description: When true, the quest can’t be considered finished until this task is completed.

requirements.description: Conditions that must be met by the player before the task is displayed on the UI and can be completed. Only tasks that currently  have their requirements met are visible.

previousTask.description: The ID of the task that must be completed immediately before this task can be done, as long as this task has a “completedPrevious” validation.

rewards.description: Conditions that must be met by the player before the task is displayed on the UI and can be completed. Only tasks that currently  have their requirements met are visible.

steps.description: The list of steps that make up the quest. These are only needed if the progressMode is step-based.
